home.hero_title: Sustainable Paper Bags for Every Need
home.hero_subtitle: Custom-made, eco-friendly packaging solutions that make a difference for your business and the planet.
home.mission_text: We're committed to providing high-quality, sustainable paper bag solutions that help businesses reduce their environmental impact while maintaining excellence in packaging.
home.feature_eco_text: All our bags are made from 100% recyclable materials, helping reduce plastic waste and protect our environment.
home.feature_custom_text: Tailored to your exact specifications with custom sizes, colors, and branding options to match your business.
home.feature_quality_text: Durable construction and superior materials ensure your products are well-protected and beautifully presented.
home.cta_green_subtitle: Join thousands of businesses making the switch to sustainable packaging.
home.journey_tagline: From humble beginnings to a leader in sustainable packaging
home.journey_text: Since our founding in 2009, EcoBag Co. has been dedicated to revolutionizing the packaging industry with eco-friendly solutions. What started as a small workshop has blossomed into a global enterprise, serving over 10,000 businesses worldwide.
home.vision_text: To be the global leader in sustainable packaging solutions, inspiring businesses to embrace eco-friendly practices while delivering exceptional quality and service.
home.mission_text_2: To create innovative, high-quality paper bag solutions that prioritize environmental sustainability and customer satisfaction.

about.title: About EcoBag Co.
about.subtitle: Leading the way in sustainable packaging solutions since 2009
about.story_p1: Founded in 2009, EcoBag Co. started with a simple mission: to provide businesses with high-quality, sustainable packaging alternatives that don't compromise on quality or aesthetics.
about.story_p2: What began as a small workshop with just three employees has grown into a thriving company serving over 10,000 businesses worldwide. Our commitment to sustainability and excellence has remained unchanged throughout our journey.
about.story_p3: Today, we produce millions of custom paper bags annually, each one crafted with care and made from 100% recyclable materials. We're proud to be part of the solution to reducing plastic waste while helping businesses present their products beautifully.
about.story_p4: Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to ensure every bag meets our high standards of quality and sustainability. From design to delivery, we're committed to providing exceptional service and products that make a positive impact on our planet.
about.value1_text: Every decision we make prioritizes environmental responsibility and long-term sustainability.
about.value2_text: We never compromise on quality, ensuring every product meets the highest standards.
about.value3_text: Your success is our success. We work closely with each client to deliver perfect solutions.
about.faq1_q: What materials are your bags made from?
about.faq1_a: All our bags are made from 100% recyclable kraft paper sourced from sustainably managed forests. We use eco-friendly inks and adhesives to ensure the entire product is environmentally responsible.
about.faq2_q: What is the minimum order quantity?
about.faq2_a: Our minimum order quantity varies depending on the bag type and customization level. Generally, we require a minimum of 500 units for custom-printed bags and 100 units for standard designs. Contact us for specific details about your needs.
about.faq3_a: Standard orders typically take 2-3 weeks from approval of the design to delivery. Custom orders with special printing or unique specifications may take 3-4 weeks. Rush orders are available for an additional fee.
about.faq4_q: Can you print my logo on the bags?
about.faq4_a: Yes! We offer full custom printing services. You can add your logo, brand colors, and any design elements you'd like. We provide design assistance and will send you proofs for approval before production begins.
about.faq5_a: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location and order size. Contact us for a detailed shipping quote for your specific location.
about.faq6_q: Are the bags strong enough for heavy items?
about.faq6_a: Absolutely! Our bags are designed for durability. We offer various thicknesses and reinforcement options depending on your needs. Our heavy-duty bags can safely carry up to 15 pounds, and we can customize the strength for your specific requirements.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our range of sustainable paper bag solutions, each designed with quality and the environment in mind.
products.shopping_desc: Durable, eco-friendly bags perfect for retail and commercial use. Available in various sizes and customizable with your brand.
products.gift_desc: Elegant bags designed to make your gifts stand out. Perfect for special occasions and premium presentations.
products.food_desc: Grease-resistant bags ideal for bakeries, restaurants, and food service. Safe, hygienic, and sustainable.
products.cta_custom_subtitle: We specialize in creating custom paper bags tailored to your exact specifications. Let's discuss your project!

footer.tagline: Sustainable packaging solutions for your business

solutions.title: Solutions for Every Industry
solutions.subtitle: Explore our tailored paper bag solutions designed to meet the unique needs of various industries.
solutions.text: At EcoBag Co., we understand that different industries have distinct packaging requirements. That's why we offer specialized paper bag solutions that cater to a variety of sectors, ensuring that your packaging not only meets your functional needs but also aligns with your brand values and sustainability goals.
solutions.retail_text: Enhance your brand with our durable and customizable shopping bags, perfect for boutiques, department stores, and specialty shops.
solutions.food_text: Our food-safe paper bags are ideal for restaurants, cafes, and bakeries, providing hygienic and eco-friendly packaging options.
solutions.events_text: Make a lasting impression with our elegant gift bags, perfect for weddings, corporate events, and hospitality services.
solutions.ecommerce_text: Protect your products during shipping with our sturdy and recyclable packaging solutions designed for online retailers.

success.title: Success Stories
success.subtitle_1: See how our sustainable paper bag solutions
success.subtitle_2: have helped businesses like yours make a positive impact.
success.subtitle_3: We are with you every step you take
success.story1_text: We take the time to understand your unique packaging needs and sustainability goals, ensuring our solutions align perfectly with your business objectives.
success.story2_text: We collaborate closely with you to design custom paper bags that reflect your brand identity while prioritizing eco-friendly materials and practices.
success.story3_text: We utilize advanced manufacturing techniques to produce high-quality, durable paper bags that meet your specifications and exceed your expectations.
